snippet: A review of Benghazi-related documents last summer set off events in the State Department leading to the public disclosure this week of Mrs. Clinton’s use of a private email account, according to current and former department officials.
abstract: Former Sec of State Hillary Clinton, facing controversy, asks State Dept to review and release emails from private account that she used exclusively while in office; public disclosure was the result of chain of events that began with departmental review of documents related to the 2012 attacks in Benghazi, Libya.
lead_paragraph: A review of Benghazi-related documents last summer set off events in the State Department leading to the public disclosure this week of Mrs. Clinton’s use of a private email account, according to current and former department officials.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Asks State Department to Vet Emails for Release
headline.print_headline: Clinton Asks State Dept. to Vet Emails for Release
